attributes.action: Reduce the copyright term for performers from 50 to 20 years to equalise with patent rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should a select few be able to live off work completed 50 years ago? Removing this "tax" on music would stimulate the economy and reduce the excessive "unearned (in the recent history) incomes of idle celebraties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
